-- | Haskell 98 monad products
--   
--   Haskell 98 monad products
@package monad-products
@version 3.0.1


-- | Monad Products
module Control.Monad.Product

-- | disjoint <tt>Graph</tt> union as a <a>Monad</a> product
newtype Product g h a
Product :: (g a, h a) -> Product g h a
runProduct :: Product g h a -> (g a, h a)
instance (MonadPlus g, MonadPlus h) => MonadPlus (Product g h)
instance (Alternative g, Alternative h) => Alternative (Product g h)
instance (Alt g, Alt h) => Alt (Product g h)
instance (Monad g, Monad h) => Monad (Product g h)
instance (Bind g, Bind h) => Bind (Product g h)
instance (Applicative g, Applicative h) => Applicative (Product g h)
instance (Apply g, Apply h) => Apply (Product g h)
instance (Functor g, Functor h) => Functor (Product g h)
